page.content: Watch Blaze take on Talons (8 p.m. ET Wednesday, ESPN2) Latest AUSL news Talons clinch AUSL championship berth, notch series win in potential finals preview AUSL back in action Wednesday with Blaze vs. Talons (ESPN2, 8 p.m. ET) Good things come in threes: Bandits homer three times in the third inning Talons blow 5-0 lead â€¦ then win in extras Sierra on Sierra crime!
